@newbiedm In my setting, the high elves are gone, and not a player option. There is a specific reason for this that is tied to the backstory of the world. Players don't like not having the option, but I've been gratified to see them RP it, lamenting the loss of the elves in character.

@newbiedm Sure. Every table has a diff vision of the game. For us, D&D is a toolkit for making our own fantasy worlds. One way to tell the story of your world is to add, remove, or modify char creation options. Dark Sun has no clerics, paladins, or metal, for example. Fantastic setting.
